synopsis.text: The tale revolves around Yuzuki Shidou, a high school sophomore grappling with the dilemma of discovering her life's purpose, while constantly pressured by her parents to hit the books. Out of the blue, a magical creature named Blublu-kun enters her life, offering guidance on how to find and pursue her dreams. As Yuzuki embarks on a journey of self-discovery, she learns the art of spreading joy to those around her, gradually unearthing clues that lead her closer to her own aspirations and shaping her vision for the future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
